description:
Controllers in api.openstack.servers has unused broken method _get_addresses_view_builder.
It's broken because nova.api.openstack.views.addresses.ViewBuilderV11(req) have constructor without args.

Also in imports are several unused import calls and no ova.api.openstack.views.images import
title: Controllers in api.openstack.servers has unused broken method _get_addresses_view_builder
